content: a beautiful combination of woolstok north and prairie this warm and colorful cowl is a quick knit on larger needles experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok north super bulky 100% fine highland wool 150g/107yds 1 hank a * prairie fingering 53% suri alpaca 47% baby huacaya alpaca 50g/273yds 1 hank b * tapestry needle finished measurments * circumference 25 * height 12 color shown * cranberry compote no 4310 a * sedum no 1112 b
